title: Average weekly working hours in Sweden 2019 , by type of employment
yAxis: Average number of working hours per week
summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week and Temporary employed has the lowest Average number of working hours per week.
The maximum Form of Employment Self-employed has got 1.39 times higher Average number of working hours per week than the minimum Form of Employment Temporary employed.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of working hours per week for 4 number of Form of Employments.
The maximum Average number of working hours per week 35.4 is found at Form of Employment Self-employed and the minimum is found at Temporary employed where Form of Employment is 25.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Form of Employment in the x axis and Average number of working hours per week in the y axis.
Form of Employment Self-employed has the highest Average number of working hours per week and Temporary employed has the lowest Average number of working hours per week.
The maximum Form of Employment Self-employed has got 1.39 times higher Average number of working hours per week than the minimum Form of Employment Temporary employed.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Form of Employment, and Average number of working hours per week in each Form of Employment on the y axis.
The Average number of working hours per week is highest at Form of Employment Self-employed and lowest at Form of Employment Temporary employed.
The minimum Form of Employment Temporary employed has got 1.39 times less Average number of working hours per week than the maximum Form of Employment Self-employed.
Average number of working hours per week at Form of Employment Self-employed is 35.4 , second place is Permanently employed at 30.4, and thirdly is Employed total at 30.2.
The average Average number of working hours per week in all 4 Form of Employments is 30.38.
The Average number of working hours per week is 121.5 if we add up values of all Form of Employments.
